label: A3B_hR16_166_2h_2c-001
title: SrSn$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
The equilibrium phase diagram for the Sn-Sr system has been mapped by (Palenzona, 384): \begin{tabular}{cc} \\ Formula & Structure \\ \hline Sr & \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF4_225_a-001}{fcc ($A1$)} \\ Sr$_{2}$Sn & \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-003}{Cotunnite, PbCl$_{2}$ ($C23$)} \\ Sr$_{5}$Sn$_{3}$ & \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B5_tI32_140_ah_cl-001}{Cr$_{5}$B$_{3}$ ($D8_{l}$)} \\ SrSn & \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oC8_63_c_c-001}{CrB ($B33$)} \\ Sr$_{3}$Sn$_{5}$ & \href{current_web_home_dir/A5B3_oC32_63_cfg_ce-001}{Pd$_{5}$Pu$_{3}$} \\ SrSn$_{3}$ & \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_hR16_166_2h_2c-001}{SrSn$_{3}$} (this structure) \\ SrSn$_{4}$ & \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B_oC20_63_acf_c-001}{SrSn$_{4}$} \\ Sn & \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF8_227_a-001}{diamond ($A4$)} or \href{current_web_home_dir/A_tI4_141_a-001}{$\beta$-Sn ($A5$)} \end{tabular} 
 BaPb$_{3}$ has also been found with small amounts calcium and strontium impurities on the barium sites.
